Hero.title: AI + Template
Hero.subtitle: Build Your Web App
Hero.description: AI-powered Next.js development template, the perfect combination for Vibe Coding. Includes payment, authentication, articles, blog and more. Combined with videos and courses to help you launch your website and earn your first income quickly

testimonial.name: Developer
testimonial.quote: A minimalist template system that boosts development efficiency by 300%

Case.title: Websites built with MvpFast
Case.subtitle: Multiple website products have been built using MvpFast, all of the following products are live

items.title: LogoCook-Logo Chef
items.des: LogoCook is a fast and free logo generator that allows you to quickly create the logo you want through online editing, including free logo downloads, cute logo property designs, uploading custom svg files, meeting the needs of individuals and businesses to quickly create logos

items.title: WeFight-Let's fight together!
items.des: WeFight is a website that helps you achieve goals through mutual check-ins and competitive rankings. By creating goal task groups, inviting friends to join, completing daily check-in tasks, and using daily check-ins to cultivate good habits and achieve goals, it's suitable for fitness, learning, reading, work, and various social scenarios

items.title: IMessageU-Idea Message User
items.des: A product that quickly opens user feedback channels, creating your panel to receive user voices and suggestions, helping developers build better products, helping developers reduce the development of false requirements, and helping developers avoid useless work

Price.title: Showcase your plans
Price.subtitle: Provide detailed information about your plans to reassure users when purchasing

Price.tips: For refund issues, please contact customer service

normal.name: Development Template Code
normal.description: Includes basic website development functions, such as user login, database, blog, articles, payment and other integration solutions. After purchase, you can use the MvpFast template permanently, and enjoy the updated functions of subsequent versions of the template. If you encounter problems during the website launch process, you can enjoy the author's technical support service to help you solve all technical problems.
includedFeatures: Login + Database + Payment functionality and other encapsulation capabilities

most.name: Development Template Code + NextJs Full Stack Development Course from 0 to 1
most.description: Includes all content of the development template code and all content of the NextJs full stack development course from 0 to 1
includedFeatures: Login + Database + Payment functionality and other encapsulation capabilities
NextJs full stack development course from 0 to 1

Faq.title: Common questions about MvpFast
Faq.subtitle: If your question has an answer here, you can contact us in the following ways

items.question: MvpFast payment issues
items.answer: MvpFast template's payment function is completely in accordance with relevant national regulations, currently using WeChat's payment method. To connect to the payment module, developers need to verify as a WeChat merchant and bind payment keys to use the payment function.

items.question: What do I get after purchase
items.answer: After purchase, you will get all the code of the template: including login module, payment module, UI module, frontend code, WeChat public account code, etc. Afterwards, you can use the template to quickly implement your ideas, and when you encounter any problems with MvpFast code, processes, or related issues, you can add WeChat jiajiandu to ask questions, and I will reply within 24 hours.

items.question: What can I do after purchasing MvpFast
items.answer: You can use this template to build any type and number of websites and quickly commercialize them, or simply learn from the code template. However, you are not allowed to privately resell the MvpFast template code, nor are you allowed to share it on related code platforms. If discovered, legal responsibility will be pursued.

items.question: How to deploy MvpFast
items.answer: Deploying MvpFast is very simple, just submit the code to your personal git repository, then deploy with one click through Vercel, the entire process takes only 1 minute.
